languages.text: {n}Слепец, облаченный в зеленое, встает между вами и скрипучим Ничто, заслоняя собой.{/n} "Что ты, отродье? Я тебя не чувствую. Ты — не от варпа. Что ты за извращение?"

{n}A blind man clad in green appears between you and the croaking Nothingness, shielding you.{/n} "What manner of abomination are you? I cannot sense you. You are not of the warp. What is your twisted nature?"
languages.original_text: {n}Слепец, облаченный в зеленое, встает между вами и скрипучим Ничто, заслоняя собой.{/n} "Что ты, отродье? Я тебя не чувствую. Ты — не от варпа. Что ты за извращение?"

{n}A blind man clad in green appears between you and the croaking Nothingness, shielding you.{/n} "What manner of abomination are you? I cannot sense you. You are not of the warp. What is your twisted nature?"

{n}A blind man clad in green appears between you and the croaking Nothingness, shielding you.{/n} "What manner of abomination are you? I cannot sense you. You are not of the warp. What is your twisted nature?"

languages.text: {n}Un hombre ciego ataviado de verde aparece entre tú y la Nada estridente para protegerte.{/n} «¿Qué clase de abominación eres? No puedo sentirte. No perteneces a la disformidad. ¿De dónde provienes, retorcida criatura?».
languages.original_text: {n}A blind man clad in green appears between you and the croaking Nothingness, shielding you.{/n} "What manner of abomination are you? I cannot sense you. You are not of the warp. What is your twisted nature?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un hombre ciego ataviado de verde aparece entre tú y la Nada estridente para protegerte.{/n} «¿Qué clase de abominación eres? No puedo sentirte. No perteneces a la disformidad. ¿De dónde provienes, retorcida criatura?».

languages.text: {n}緑色の服を着た盲目の男が、自分としわがれた声の「無」の間に割って入り、守るように立つ。{/n}「ひどく忌まわしいやり口だな？お前の正体は掴めない。<歪み>のものではないな。そのねじ曲がった性質は何だ？」
languages.original_text: {n}A blind man clad in green appears between you and the croaking Nothingness, shielding you.{/n} "What manner of abomination are you? I cannot sense you. You are not of the warp. What is your twisted nature?"

traits.locale_text: {n}緑色の服を着た盲目の男が、自分としわがれた声の「無」の間に割って入り、守るように立つ。{/n}「ひどく忌まわしいやり口だな？お前の正体は掴めない。<歪み>のものではないな。そのねじ曲がった性質は何だ？」

languages.text: {n}一位身穿绿袍的盲人出现在你与虚无之间，将你保护起来。{/n}“你是什么怪物？我感知不到你的存在。你不是亚空间的恶魔，你究竟是什么样的孽物？”
languages.original_text: {n}A blind man clad in green appears between you and the croaking Nothingness, shielding you.{/n} "What manner of abomination are you? I cannot sense you. You are not of the warp. What is your twisted nature?"

traits.locale_text: {n}一位身穿绿袍的盲人出现在你与虚无之间，将你保护起来。{/n}“你是什么怪物？我感知不到你的存在。你不是亚空间的恶魔，你究竟是什么样的孽物？”

languages.text: {n}Ein blinder Mann in grünem Gewand erscheint zwischen dir und dem krächzenden Nichts, wie ein Schild, der dich beschützt.{/n} "Was seid Ihr für eine Abscheulichkeit? Ich kann Euch nicht spüren. Ihr stammt nicht aus dem Warp. Was seid Ihr für ein krankes Geschöpf?"
languages.original_text: {n}A blind man clad in green appears between you and the croaking Nothingness, shielding you.{/n} "What manner of abomination are you? I cannot sense you. You are not of the warp. What is your twisted nature?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein blinder Mann in grünem Gewand erscheint zwischen dir und dem krächzenden Nichts, wie ein Schild, der dich beschützt.{/n} "Was seid Ihr für eine Abscheulichkeit? Ich kann Euch nicht spüren. Ihr stammt nicht aus dem Warp. Was seid Ihr für ein krankes Geschöpf?"

languages.text: {n}Un aveugle vêtu de vert apparaît entre vous et le Néant croassant, comme pour faire barrage de son corps et vous protéger.{/n} « Quel genre d'abomination êtes-vous ? Je ne perçois pas votre présence. Vous n'émanez pas du Warp. Quelle est donc votre nature contrefaite ? »
languages.original_text: {n}A blind man clad in green appears between you and the croaking Nothingness, shielding you.{/n} "What manner of abomination are you? I cannot sense you. You are not of the warp. What is your twisted nature?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Un aveugle vêtu de vert apparaît entre vous et le Néant croassant, comme pour faire barrage de son corps et vous protéger.{/n} « Quel genre d'abomination êtes-vous ? Je ne perçois pas votre présence. Vous n'émanez pas du Warp. Quelle est donc votre nature contrefaite ? »

languages.text: {n}Yeşile bürünmüş kör bir adam, kıkırdayan Hiçlik ile aranda belirip sana kalkan oluyor.{/n} "Ne tür bir ucubesin sen? Seni sezemiyorum. Öteboyuta ait değilsin. Sapkın tabiatının altında ne yatıyor?"
languages.original_text: {n}A blind man clad in green appears between you and the croaking Nothingness, shielding you.{/n} "What manner of abomination are you? I cannot sense you. You are not of the warp. What is your twisted nature?"
